paragraphs.body: The scene then changes to the fortified spirit portal.
paragraphs.text: The scene then changes to the fortified spirit portal.

paragraphs.body: As the crowd chants, Zhu Li and Raiko look around and glare at each other.
paragraphs.text: As the crowd chants, Zhu Li and Raiko look around and glare at each other.

paragraphs.body: Meanwhile, Mako drives a police van through the streets, Bolin and Korra sitting in the passenger seats of the vehicle. He pulls up next to a shabby building with shattered windows.
paragraphs.text: Meanwhile, Mako drives a police van through the streets, Bolin and Korra sitting in the passenger seats of the vehicle. He pulls up next to a shabby building with shattered windows.

paragraphs.body: The scene changes to the control room of the airship, where Tokuga is standing next to the pilot.
paragraphs.text: The scene changes to the control room of the airship, where Tokuga is standing next to the pilot.

paragraphs.body: Down below, Iroh approaches Raiko and Wenyan.
paragraphs.text: Down below, Iroh approaches Raiko and Wenyan.

paragraphs.body: In the gondola, Asami looks at Wonyong.
paragraphs.text: In the gondola, Asami looks at Wonyong.

paragraphs.body: Outside, Korra steers Oogi above the airship and crouches on his head, preparing to jump off.
paragraphs.text: Outside, Korra steers Oogi above the airship and crouches on his head, preparing to jump off.

paragraphs.body: On the ground, Mako and Bolin have just come through the portal to see the airship hurtling downward, as well as the falling Tokuga.
paragraphs.text: On the ground, Mako and Bolin have just come through the portal to see the airship hurtling downward, as well as the falling Tokuga.
